snippet: Both panels appear to have been dedicated to exploring issues that have polarized the gaming community since last year, when an online movement known by the Twitter hashtag #GamerGate first formed.
abstract: Both panels appear to have been dedicated to exploring issues that have polarized the gaming community since last year, when an online movement known by the Twitter hashtag #GamerGate first formed.

headline.print_headline: SXSW Event Calls Off Game Panels After Threats
headline.main: SXSW Cancels Gamer Panels After Threats
